example[0]: Most analysts are forecasting a further downturn in the market.
example[1]: As soon as she graduated from college, she started to play the market (=risk money on the stock market).
example[2]: The markets (=all the stock markets in the world) are better prepared for a weakening economy than they were ten years ago.
definition[1]: the total amount of trade in a particular kind of goods
example[3]: Honda is trying to increase its market share.
example[4]: the state of the art market
example[5]: Investors in the property market are worried about rising inflation.
definition[2]: the system in which all prices and wages depend on what goods people want to buy, how many they buy etc
example[7]: The president believes prices should be determined by the market, not the government.
